title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes.
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Among the noblemen of distinction, there appeared in person, or by representation, the Marquis of Huntly, eldest son of the Duke of Gordon; the Marquis ofTulliebardine, eldest son of the Duke of Athole ; the Earls of Nithsdale, Marischal, Traquair, Errol, Southesk, Camwath, and Linlithgow; the Viscounts ofKilsythe, Kenmuir, Kingston, and Stormount; the Lords Rollo, Duffus, Drummond, Strathallan, Ogilvy, and Naime.

title: Secretar. Founded on the story of the Casket Letters
author: Beatty, W.
snippet: The Regent, thelord James, having been shot at Linlithgow, and no man asyet appointed to replace him, whiles all the noblemen of note,Argyle, Huntly, Athole, Errol, Eglinton and Ogilvie, and a hostbehind them, being strong for the restoration of the queen, wewere in hopes that gif we adventured home we would be safe.
